name: Showers Pass Ultra-light Waterproof Socks - Unisex
description: No one likes soggy feet. These socks have a 3-layer design, like a waterproof jacket, to keep your feet dry without getting clammy or overheating.Wear-resistant knit with Artex waterproof-breathable membrane.Wearable in close fitting cycling or running shoes.As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of  their goods and services.
